text: The Smoky Hill River is a river in the central Great Plains of North America. It goes through the U.S. states of Colorado and Kansas.Smoky Hill River. (2009). In Encyclopædia Britannica. Retrieved July 22, 2009, from Encyclopædia Britannica Online: http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/550068/Smoky- Hill-River ==Name== The river gets its name from the Smoky Hills area in the Great Plains. ==References== Category:Rivers of Kansas
title: Smoky Hill River
